13348.「あ…あ その声……は <pc>さ…ん。\n お元気で……たか？:
Ah...ah, that voice...is
<pc>'s...hmm. How are you...?

13349.「こ…うして 会話は…できますが\n あいかわ……ず 雑…音が ひど……ですね。:
I can... talk... but... the... noise... is...
still... terrible.

13350.「じつは…私 あれ…から しらべ……んです。\n この…シーバの鏡のメンテ…ナン:
Actually, I've known since... since...
since... I've been trying to figure out... how
to maintain... this Sheba mirror.

13351.「その…方法という……は 魔物に…\n マホトラを使って……あるアイテムに…\n:
The method...is to use Drain Magic...on a
monster to store <%dEV_QUE_T_NUM0> MP...in an item.

13352.「ただ……勝たな…と その戦い…で ためた分は\n 無効…す。今後の…スムーズ…:
But... if you don't win, the Psyche Up from that battle is null and void. For the sake of smooth... conversation... in the future...
would you do me a favor?

13353.「ありが……うございます。\n それ…では まず これを……\n 受け取っ……く:
Thank you very much. Well... then, please...
take... this... first.

13354.「今から…送るのは シーバの鏡…を\n メンテナンス…するのに 欠かせ…いもので:
I am about to send you something that is
essential to the maintenance of Sheba's
mirror. It's called... the Mage Duster!

13356.「メイジダスターは 魔力を吸…収して\n こすった…モノに その魔力をあた…える:
Mage Duster is a special Magicloth that
absorbs magic power and rubs it into the
object it is rubbed on.

13357.「マホトラで…<%nEV_QUE_T_NUM0>ＭＰの魔力を…ためたら\n シー:
Once you have...stored <%dEV_QUE_T_NUM0> MP from...Drain
Magic, please rub...Sheba's...mirror. Then...
the mirror should be fixed.

13358.「くれぐれも よろし……くお願いします。\n では 今日のとこ…ろは \n こ…:
Please take care of me. Well then, I'll leave
you with this... today.

13359.「ありが……うございます。\n で…も あなたは たく…さんの\n 頼まれご…と:
Thank you very much. So... you have a lot of
Coral's requests to do.

13360.「しかた……ありませんね。\n この件は また今度……ということで。:
I have no choice...I guess. We'll talk about
this another time.

13361.「そ…うですか。残念……です。\n もし 気が変わ……たら また\n この鏡に:
I see.... I'm sorry. If you change your mind,
please talk to this mirror again.

13363.「もしか……して シーバの…鏡の\n メンテナンスをして…ほしいという頼みを\n:
I was wondering if you might be willing to do
me the favor of maintaining Sheba's mirror.
You would?

13365.「そ…れでは そのダスター……で\n シーバの鏡を こす……てみてください。<y:
Well... then, try rubbing Sheba's mirror with
that duster.<yesno><close>

13366.「……す…みませ……雑音…が多く…て\n 聞き…とれな……。おねが……します。\:
There is a lot of noise and I can't hear what
you are saying. Please try rubbing the mirror
with a duster.<yesno><close>

13367.<pc>は メイジダスターで\nはげしく 鏡をこすってみた！:
<pc> scrubbed the mirror vigorously
with Mage Duster!

13368.メイジダスターは 魔力を使い果たし\nボロボロに くずれさった。:
Mage Duster ran out of magic and fell to
pieces.

13370.「どうです ちゃんと聞こえますか？<yesno><close>: How about you, can you hear me properly?<yesno><close>

13371.「ああ うまくいったようですね！\n すっかり 声が クリアに聞こえるように\n:
Oh, it seems to have worked! I can hear your
voice perfectly clear now.

13372.「本当に ありがとうございます。\n お礼と言っては なんですが\n これを 受:
Thank you so much. I don't mean to thank you,
but please accept this.

13373.「この シーバの鏡を手に入れてから\n 毎晩のように 語りかけてきたのですが\n:
I have talked to you every night since I
received this Sheba mirror, and you were the
only one who responded.

13374.「<pc>さんは いい人ですね。\n 私は だんだん あなたのことが\n 気にな:
<pc> is a nice guy. I'm getting more
and more interested in you.

13375.「考えてみれば こうして 会話しているのに\n 私たちは おたがいの顔すら\n:
Come to think of it, we don't even know each
other's faces when we talk like this.

13376.「偶然が与えてくれた 出会いとはいえ……\n フフフ……じつに 奇妙な関係ですね:
Though it was a chance encounter given to us
by chance...hmmm...a very strange relationship
indeed.

13377.「……おっと。もう こんな時間だ。\n すっかり 会話に夢中になってしまいました:
Oops. It's already this late. I got completely
absorbed in our conversation. If you don't
mind, let's talk again.

13378.「今回は 私ばかり\n 話してしまいましたから……: I've talked too much this time, so...

13379.「次は もっと あなたの話を\n 聞きたいですね。\n それでは 今日のところは:
Next time I'd like to hear more from you. So,
that's all for today!

41535.<pc>は 鏡のある客室に 泊まった。:
<pc> stayed in a guest room with a
mirror.

41540.「あ……あ。<pc>さん。\n どう…やら メイジダスターに……\n 魔力を た:
Ah...oh. <pc>. It seems you've been
